website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy manual egg beater that works quickly and smoothly and will last you for many years.
pros: Stainless steel bridge enables you to rest the beater on the bottom of the bowl
cons: Some users have said that the plastic handle seems weak

customer_reviews.title: Mine has no soft plastic overgrips. Much lighter than ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine has no soft plastic overgrips. Much lighter than old time ones with thinner materials used. Main gear is metal, but beater gears are plastic, so lifespan of this unit is going to be limited. Wish I could find a real full metal old fashioned one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good. I wish I had gotten one wit flat ...
customer_reviews.text: Mostly good. I wish I had gotten one wit flat beater blades. Not for thicker batters. to much room in design can cause gears to slip far enough that it stops functioning sometimes till you push it back together. a little noisy. Generally works though. a little uncomfortable in the holding hand. Doesn't compare to the antique my grandma passed down. Nice that is has all metal parts and not a plastic gear wheel. workable.
customer_reviews.author: Deidra

customer_reviews.title: Second egg beater in 61 years!
customer_reviews.text: Received a set of Ekco stainless kitchen utensils for a wedding gift. About 2 months ago it broke, so wanted to get another one. This one does the job, but I don't think it will last 61 years. Neither will I!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joan M M

customer_reviews.title: good egg beater
customer_reviews.text: good egg beater. bought for an art project. heavy, sturdy feeling. I feel that due to heaviness it could get a little tiresome if you were trying to beat eggs for a prolonged time. But otherwise, fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Not as smooth running as my mama's was
customer_reviews.text: I have both a stand and hand mixer, so just need this for incidental odd jobs. If the batter gets a little heavy - such as pancake mix - this binds up and I end up pulling out my hand mixer. Just a bit disappointed as it doesn't run as smoothly as the one I remember using when I was a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Mom N

customer_reviews.title: Awful quality and not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it to use for light mixing in my kitchen. Broke the second time I used it - there is now a point in the handle’s rotation where it won’t go any further.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Looked into one web-based store, and they had one that was overpriced.....don't understand, it's just an egg beater! This is exactly what I needed for small mixing jobs in my own kitchen, I am not a 5-star chef; I cook for the pleasure I get from eating good food. This will last for years to come if one of my nieces/nephews don't get hold of it!
customer_reviews.author: Howie Bates

customer_reviews.title: Glad I picked this one
customer_reviews.text: My original 40 year old beater fell to pieces, so I spent a little more on this one and am very happy with it. Well built. Dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Not smooth running
customer_reviews.text: Returned item, its mechanical action was sticky so smooth cranking was not possible. This could be a made in China quality control issue. The label was generic, no brand name noted, just Deluxe.
customer_reviews.author: M. Daly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to wind. Didn't like the wire beaters as much as flat type but is still ok.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: I really like the fact that this is so heavy duty & ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fact that this is so heavy duty & all metal except for the top handle. Good price also.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rabing

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is not as good as my old beater for egg whites.
customer_reviews.author: Kolohe

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! We've had it for several months and it hasn't started to rust. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: D Davis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly like the one my Mama used back in the 50's but are great for little jobs that you don't want to get out the electric mixer out for. Quick and easy cleanup too.
customer_reviews.author: BPCBAMA

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and works perfectly. Easy to clean up and guess what...it works whether the electricity is on or not. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Whipity whipity!!
customer_reviews.text: Buy it best I have found. Package looks cheap but beater is super( I hate that I need more words to post reviews)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But now it's working great. I like the "stainless steel" part
customer_reviews.text: First thought it wasn't working well. But now it's working great. I like the "stainless steel" part.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: kitchen egg beater
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the money. Great for just an egg or two when you don't want to drag out the electric mixer. Rinse off promptly after use. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Fritzola

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other eggbeater I've found
customer_reviews.text: Better than any other eggbeater I've found, no where near as smooth as my decades old beater that finally fell apart. The gears are jerky, I used pieces to refurbish the old egg beater.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Bunnell

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find anymore
customer_reviews.text: Glad they are still available to buy. Works great and handy for quick jobs. I think they are better than a whisk.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard B

customer_reviews.title: Ordinary Build - I think we'll be lucky if it lasts a year
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried to turn it it was stuck. I had to straighten things out to get it going. Build quality is pretty ordinary, nothing like the one my aunt gifted us and which lasted 15 yrs. We'd be lucky if this one lasts a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this utensil! Easy to store, quick to pull out and use, and easy to clean. I wish I had found it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great, just like my mom used when I was a kid. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa C.

customer_reviews.title: beat it
customer_reviews.text: its the bees knees. it's a pretty slammin egg beater y'all. buy two if you are feeling frisky for show!
customer_reviews.author: jeremy trott

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a great buy.... shipped fast. haven't used it but seems to beat great! Always great to have an item if you have no power..:) must have!
customer_reviews.author: Randy & Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Beat it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hand beater! I had one for years and when we got our first house and got an electric mixer, I thought I would save space and donate the trusty hand beater. Big mistake and I regretted it for years! So glad I found this one and have been really happy with the quality so far. An extra plus is that it does great in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Old tech is hi-tech
customer_reviews.text: Gave my power hand mixer away ! Awesome old school utensil . Being able to mix forward and reverse makes for throughly blended mixtures . Ecologically sound , and never any attachments to look for or add! My only concern is the plastic gears driving the blades , may offer questionable long term service. Since I use it often to make the world's best scrambled eggs !
customer_reviews.author: mummee toe

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: This is a TOTAL PIECE OF JUNK! It won't crank right handed and binds either right or left. My wife hates it and uses the 30+ year old one the handle fell off, and I glued back on. Still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mick222

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Should last many years.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this basic kitchen tool. It well serves its function.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Re

customer_reviews.title: The Egg Beater with Soft Grip in the photo is ...
customer_reviews.text: The Egg Beater with Soft Grip in the photo is not the same one you get. There is no soft grip and the blade platform is not round tube but flat sheet metal. There is also a 1/3" space between the blade and the guard at the base of the unit. I will post pictures of what you get. I will not buy from this seller again, I don't believe their quality control is up to par.
customer_reviews.author: DRJAAM

customer_reviews.title: very hard to find this type of beater price good but worried about plastic handles reason for 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: very hard to find this type of beater price good but worried about plastic handles reason for 4 stars only
customer_reviews.author: amazon girl

customer_reviews.title: one of the beaters drops down upon using and has to be pushed back up in order to continue mixing
customer_reviews.text: one of the beaters drops down upon using and has to be pushed back up in order to continue mixing - a hassle which shouldn't be necessary but i dont want to go to trouble to return and get another one -
customer_reviews.author: Starlette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one strong piece of basic kitchen equipment........and it really, really works! Thank goodness these are still made.
customer_reviews.author: G.L.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as the 50-year-old beater that it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found it
customer_reviews.text: Finally, beaters work smoothly. Medium weight but seems well made. Glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J. Goldsberry

customer_reviews.title: Just RIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these are very nice and my hubby has enjoyed using them!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy and easy to turn. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S. Ferrin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really had much use of this to give a fair evaluation of it but I've taken it out and tried spinning it to make sure that it didn't stick or get stuck. The product spinned very smoothly. Seems well made and I'm glad the gears don't have any plastic parts.
customer_reviews.author: Norine Hisashima

customer_reviews.title: When using it it feels like it's binding
customer_reviews.text: When using it it feels like it's binding . The product works but it just feels like poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Keith & Christin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great! I got it as a present for a four year old! He had a blast with it and it was easy for him to use. His mom liked it too :-)
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Burnam

customer_reviews.title: JUST RIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: This egg beater is exactly like the one I wore out! It will take the place of the old one and no doubt be used constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Ali M

customer_reviews.title: beater
customer_reviews.text: looks great and works great dish washer safe very smooth action easy to crank.
customer_reviews.author: william e. spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Egg beater works great for making cakes or beating an egg makes it fluffy. fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Retro Egg Beater
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this Retro style egg beater. It is very well made and whipped up my batch of egg whites for buttermilk pancakes in a jiffy. Sometimes you just don't want to drag out the electric beater and this item was easy to grab in my gadgets drawer.
customer_reviews.author: bevtully

customer_reviews.title: Like going back in time
customer_reviews.text: This I'd a wonderful item to take on quick tasks in the kitchen without having to pull out the big mixer and all the cleanup and counter space that goes with.
customer_reviews.author: Pico

customer_reviews.title: Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have went for another brand. I would have not bought it if I could see it in person, for this price anyway. Plastic handle is not preferable and it seemed week when I used it. Not bad but not for the price considering what else is out there for $25
customer_reviews.author: gardengirl

product_meta.title: SCI Scandicrafts Egg Beater with Soft Grip, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Old-fashioned egg beaters have long been relied on for perfectly aerated egg whites and fluffy whipped cream. Sturdy stainless steel construction provides dependable results with innovation and ease. The turning knob and contoured handle have a soft, comfortable, non-slip grip for easy operation even with wet hands. Eggs, light batters, whipped cream and more are now such a breeze to whip up that even the next generation may want to take a turn.
feature_bullets: Old-fashioned egg beaters have long been relied on for perfectly aerated egg whites and fluffy whipped cream.
Sturdy stainless steel construction provides dependable results with innovation and ease.
The turning knob and contoured handle have a soft, comfortable, non-slip grip for easy operation even with wet hands.
A stainless steel bridge extends slightly longer than the Beaters to rest against the bottom of the mixing bowl to reduce arm strain.
Eggs, light batters, whipped cream and more are now such a breeze to whip up that even the next generation may want to take a turn.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars68 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
